string.value: Dark Lord is the title for the master of Kerning City... Does that mean there have been many Dark Lords? Figure out the details from #bMr. Pickall#k.
The former Dark Lord disappeared? In any case, it seems like you've heard from all the important people, so head back to #bRyden#k.

Ryden said that in order for the Dual Blades to recapture Kerning City, they must first sully the Dark Lord's reputation. He said that a plan is in the works and gave you the mission of investigating how the townspeople currently view the Dark Lord. You reported to Ryden what you discovered from the townspeople.

The current Dark Lord is the eighth one appointed, if I'm not mistaken. This is the disciple who took over after the former Dark Lord disappeared. So, all of that means that the current Dark Lord isn't very old.

Come to think of it, the disappearance of the former Dark Lord still remains a mystery. He just suddenly disappeared one day. He also had a daughter, but she disappeared, too. It was really, very strange. \r\n
Hey, aren't you #h0#, the person that Ryden has been searching for?
I'm sure of it. You need to go see #bRyden#k. It seemed quite urgent.
I'm certain of it, #h0#. Ryden was looking for you!

Okay, great. So, what did the people think?\r\n#L0##bIn general, most people trust the Dark Lord, but there were some who seem to have doubts about the thieving Spore incident, not to mention the former Dark Lord who just randomly disappeared...#l\n#k
That's very useful information. Even the strongest wall can crumble because of a small crack. You've done a good job on this mission. Now, wait until you're assigned the next mission.
Let's act like total strangers in the meantime. People might get suspicious if they saw us conversing.
#bRyden#k has been anxiously looking for you.
